name: Asahi Aqua Blue
description: A light and crisp Asahi beer found only in Japan. This beer can easily be enjoyed during Japan's hot summer months at the beach or local fireworks festivals.

name: Tazawako Pilsner
description: A locally brewed pilsner from Lake Tazawa in Akita, Japan. This pislner is great after a swim in Japan's deepest lake or after a long day of snowboarding.

name: Kirin Tanrei Green
description: This reduced sugar Kirin happoshu is light and slightly malty. A great choice when looking to cut calories but still enjoy a refreshing brew in style.

name: Yoho Tokyo Black
description: Made by one of Japan's oldest craft brewers, this porter is perfect for anyone who enjoys a rich and dark porter after a day's work.

name: Asahi Sakura
description: Asahi embraces the seasonal cheery blossom festival (hanabi) with this limited edition release. Same great taste with a great label.

name: Sapporo Classic
description: The classic taste of Sapporo only available in Hokkaido locations. This Japanese classic will take you right to the Sapporo snow festival.

name: Sapporo Black
description: Hard to find in the US, this is Sapporo's dark lager featuring distinct chocolate and coffee flavors with an uncommonly smooth finish.

name: Kirin Stout
description: Changing from a dark lager to a stout in 2013. this brew made a name for itself with it's roasted malt aroma and smooth, creamy finish.

name: Echigo Flying IPA
description: Echigo shoots to create an American style IPA and succeeds. This is a bitter brew with the strong, refreshing scent of citrus.

name: Yoho Umami IPA
description: Yoho steps up it's craft brewing with an umami IPA infused with bonito flakes. A great compliment to your next hibachi house party.

name: Yoho Aooni IPA
description: Whether you picked this up from Family Mart or Biiru International, this is a classic Japanese IPA that is welcome in any fridge.

name: Biiru Int. Shirt
description: Represent Biiru International with this finely woven brand T-Shirt! Stock is limited, so be sure to grab yours before they're gone!.

name: Biiru Int. Mug
description: Represent Biiru International with this hand-made coffee mug! Stock is limited, so be sure to grab yours before they're gone!.
